page.description: Called at the end of processing for a database level update.
page.prototype: DatabaseEnd(Context as P, Action as C)

argument.name: Context
argument.description: The object on which the function is called (generally a [DatabaseSnapshot object])

argument.name: Action
argument.description: The action being performed. Will be one of the following values: *[Load]*, *[Store]*, *[LoadDBF]*, or *[StoreDBF]*.

page.example: FUNCTION DatabaseEnd(Context as P, Action as C, TablesExpected as N) Statusbar.Set_Text("Database " + Action + " complete.") END FUNCTION
